thread.title: "OVO" Air Jordan 12 Release Date Confirmed For NBA All-Star Weekend
thread.title_full: "OVO" Air Jordan 12 Release Date Confirmed For NBA All-Star Weekend

author: Kyle Rooney
title: "OVO" Air Jordan 12 Release Date Confirmed For NBA All-Star Weekend
text:
Home > Sneakers > "OVO" Air Jordan 12 Release Date Confirmed For NBA All-Star Weekend "OVO" Air Jordan 12 Release Date Confirmed For NBA All-Star Weekend 1 0 Posted by Kyle Rooney  55pm Black OVO 12s releasing next month. 
The all-black version of Drake 's "OVO" Air Jordan 12 will finally be releasing on February 18th, right in the middle of the NBA's All-Star weekend. 
The premium nubuck Air Jordan 12s, featuring stingray leather accents and OVO branding, will reportedly retail for $225 according to J23App . 
The white and gold rendition of the "OVO" Air Jordan 12 released last October and it featured a line of apparel as well some "OVO" Jordan slides and an OVO backpack. We expect some similar gear to accompany the black, stingray laden 12s when they launch for NBA All-Star, although at this time nothing has been confirmed. 
Of course, availability will be sparse which will only add to the hype surrounding this upcoming All-Star release. We'll keep you posted with a list of retailers who will have the "OVO" Air Jordan 12s in stock as the release date approaches. 
In the meantime, get reacquainted with the murdered out 12s in the gallery above and let us know if you're feeling the look.
